QuestData.Title: The Mariner's Revenge
QuestData.Description: I'm not gonna sit in a damn rocking chair while my crew gets devoured by a leviathan!$B$BCome on, let's get to the dock and launch a dinghy. I got a special one set up just for this kind of situation. My own little Mist-Hopper Jr.$B$BWe'll give that thing a case of harpoon fever.
QuestData.LogDescription: Launch the Mist-Hopper Jr. from the dock in Soggy's Gamble and use it to bring down Jiao.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice shooting out there!$B$BI knew we could do it. Never met anything that can't be killed with enough harpoons.
